author: Cindy  Boren
title: Utah’s Rudy Gobert reports losing his sense of smell ‘the last four days’ because of the coronavirus - The Washington Post
description: Utah’s Rudy Gobert reports losing his sense of smell ‘the last four days’ because of the coronavirus The Washington Post Rudy Gobert says he's lost his sense of smell due to coronavirus Yahoo Sports Adam Silver and the NBA Are Reportedly Not Thinking About a …
content: According to the American Academy of Otolaryngology, that isnt unusual. In a post on its website Sunday, it cited growing anecdotal evidence indicating that lost or reduced sense of smell and loss of taste are symptoms associated with covid-19. The organizati… [+3019 chars]
